As Parute, you'll command your party of monster girls in combat against naughty enemies, exploiting weaknesses to gain the upper hand in turn-based combat. Adventure across islands in 3D and ride Otton to reach secret areas, gather items and enhance your abilities as you level up! With the special "Booby Training" system, you can control the bust size of the all-female crew for stat boosts, bigger for increased power and defense or smaller for improved speed and agility!

name: Super Shadow Break: Showdown! Ninja vs. The Three Kaijus
description: The souls of ancient Kaijus have been unleashed from sealed urns hidden in forbidden ruins. Tadashi and Kiyoshi set out to defeat the three resurrected Kaijus, but they are confronted by an army of ninjas led by the Evil ninja Yamada!

name: Space Party
description: Space Party is a party game to play with your friends in local multiplayer, where you will face each other to see who is the best at scoring and defending. The more players, the more chaotic the games will be! Choose your game mode and play with friends, against AI or both, mixed with events that make each game feel unique. This game is a revolutionary redesign of the classic game Pong, where players will have skills at their disposal to ensure madness all across the levels, with dozens of balls flying across the field!

name: Insert Before Flight
description: Insert before flight is a flight simulator focused on small aircrafts. You can fly different aircrafts and choose different departure airfields. Fly in a big scale terrain and explore the different points of interests like a water park, different towns and cities. To complete your adventure land your aircraft on one of three airfields.

name: Arcade Archives: New Rally-X
description: New Rally-X is an action game released in 1981. This work is a full model change from the previous Rally-X. Experience the same thrilling car chases against red cars, now with easier gameplay.

name: 1CC Games Shmup Collection
description: Both of 1CC Games' super-shmups offer veterans and newcomers alike the chance to perfect their high scoring ambitions with comprehensive practice modes, in-game challenges, and old-school replayability. Brace yourself for a challenge, but know that with practice comes perfection - and maybe even the elusive 1CC!

name: Hungry Ball Physics
description: Hungry ball physics is a physics puzzle game where you need to draw lines to lead the ball to the sweets. You have to overcome obstacles and hurdles in over 99 brain teasing Levels.

name: Our Winter Sports
description: Everyone's out in the snow for some frosty fun! Play 10 kinds of winter sports! There's curling, ice hockey, snow mobile races, snowball fights, and more to enjoy!

name: Let it Roll 2
description: Let it roll has a simple goal. Arrange the puzzle pieces by sliding them into the correct position to let the ball roll into the goal. Two game modes are included, the star mode where you need to collect stars to unlock new puzzles and the rotation mode where special tiles are introduced. Both of the game modes have plenty of levels ready to be solved.

name: Polgar Magic Detective: Murder Mystery Journey
description:
Will you be able to solve the magical crimes without making a mistake? If you like detective games and magic pay attention: this case is very special.
Embark on a mysterious adventure and uncover the dark secrets surrounding the crimes of Polgar Magic Detective: Murder Mystery Journey. A writer has been found dead under strange circumstances at his home. The house is a mess. There is evidence that a magical creature was responsible for this, but who is using the magical beasts to take the law into their own hands? Investigate a supernatural criminal case: collect and uncover all the evidence, interpret the clues and solve the case.

name: Shark Adventure
description: Shark Adventure puts you in the role of a shark and your primary focus is to acquire as many stars as you can, while avoiding obstacles that come your way. It's a very engaging and impressive game with lots of fun and enjoyable mechanics. This is not a simple game, it requires a lot of precision and attention. But it goes to show how exciting and fun this type of experience actually is.

name: The Sims 4: Carnaval Streetwear Kit
description: Bring the energy with The Sims 4 Carnaval Streetwear Kit*! Designed in partnership with Pabllo Vittar, this collection celebrates Brazil’s Carnaval spirit with creative ways to spice up your Sim’s appearance.

name: Pokémon: Greg Version
description: A Pokemon fangame focusing on the "Greg Discord server" filled with iconic members of the server, in-jokes, and even changes to Pokemon in this incredible journey as you attempt to take on the Gym Challenge, and take down the insidious plot of the nefarious team Primary Colours. Can you save the world of Greg?

name: Black Ace
description: Competitive multiplayer match with vehicles and arcade elements that makes the gameplay unpredictable. Select and customize your operators and your weapons. Choose a strategy to win in a open map. Became a master of all game modes. Create your clan and level up until the BLACK ACE level!

name: Roma VR: Domus
description: Walk through the doors of history and visit a famous house in ancient Pompeii. Take a voice guided tour or explore on your own in this glimpse of life in ancient Roman times in virtual reality.

name: Afterlife: Killing Death
description: Be permeated by the adrenaline-pumping gameplay worthy of the most famous shooters and survive the rise of madness! Experience the chaos and human perversion firsthand. This adventure will take you from the dark streets of DreamCity to the higher floors of the corporations that control it.

name: Fragroom: Defenders
description: Fragroom: Defenders is a Tower Defense multiplayer shooting game set in a zombie post-apocalyptic town. Choose your weapons, fight against different enemies, find the best team and tactics to save your shelter from zombie foragers.

name: Arboreal
description: Play as a lizard climbing to the top of the tallest tree in the forest!

name: Community College Hero: Fun and Games
description: Ever wonder how heroes-in-training spend their time between epic confrontations with dastardly villains? Join the students at Speck Community College as they enjoy a tabletop roleplay game, investigate a legendary small-town monster, and endure the embarrassments of Parents’ Day.

name: Treasure Temples
description: Puzzle your way through ancient treasure chambers in Antarctica. Floor tiles will crumble away behind you with every step you take, so tread carefully in your search for gold!

name: Dead Gun
description: DEAD GUN is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements. Take control of a soldier of the elite squad Z-800 and go on an operation to clear friendly worlds from enemies in order to save them.

name: Zombie Good Guy
description: You are the Last Zombie on Earth and You are the Good Guy. The Evil Humans are trying to destroy You. Can You Survive ?

name: Fayburrow
description: In a world of fairies, a childhood friend suddenly calls Beatrice back to her old hometown. Yet when she arrives, her friend is mysteriously missing.

name: Elven Warmaiden
description: An fantasy Auto-battler game in which you command the elven Warmaidens to fend off waves and waves of attack from enemies besieging your capital city

name: Ampguard
description: Ampguard is a rogue-like game with a unique combat system and nasty monsters. Combine your skills and use them in the best possible way to emerge victorious from the battle against the Yokai.

name: Detective Agency
description: Exciting adventure game with a stylish comic graphics and lots of puzzles, riddles and mini games. Fun for the whole family.

name: Mystery of the Missing Brigantine
description: An exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game which takes you on the amazing journey of treasure hunters who need your help to find the missing person. Enjoy hours of fun in this mystic, storydriven game!

name: Spirits of Light
description: An action adventure game with a premise based on the Little Red Riding Hood tale and Souls-Like mechanics.

name: Monster Fruit Academy
description:
Monster Fruit Academy is an exciting parkour-style game. Experience challenges and adventures by working together, but still competing with one another, in single-player or four-player team modes.

Players will be equipped with different types of cards and work together to become the best team of little monster warriors. Levels and Missions The Monster Fruit world is filled with fantastic creatures; in this world, creatures seemingly identical from those in the real world can have unexpected powers. Embark on a wondrous adventure, and complete progressively more demanding levels in a variety of scenarios. You may be battling through a mysterious land of water, climbing up unimaginably tall beanstalks, or running among scorching volcanoes. Each level will test the reflexes of the best little monster.

name: QUByte Classics: The Humans by Piko
description:
The Humans are one of the first games of his time to present cooperation within characters to achieve the objectives that is to make sure your tribe will be alive at the end of the day, organization is the key, and pre-plan your time is highly important.

The player controls a group of humans and may switch between any human at any time, in order to complete a level, it is often necessary to use certain tools or abilities, such as stacking to reach a high ledge.

name: Monsters Domain
description: Defend the Monsters’ Domain. Kill heroes and collect their treasures. Play the Monsters’ side and loot foolish warriors who dare to explore your realm. Build up your forces, upgrade them and equip them with better weapons, skills and tricks to lure and kill even more shiny forces of the light.

name: Zombie Carnage 2
description: Zombie Carnage 2 is a 32 player first person shooter where you will play both as a human and zombie. By killing zombies and infecting humans you will permanently level up, unlock weapons, attachments, zombie classes and more.

name: Ultrawings 2
description: Welcome back to Ultrawings, Pilot! Take to the skies using your virtual hands (or HOTAS and gamepad) to fly 5 unique aircraft as you complete a diverse set of engaging, hand-crafted missions across an island-themed world in this made-for-VR, aerial-themed, action-adventure game!

name: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
description: The last great human settlement exists within an unforgiving, infected world. Exceptional agility and combat skills make you a powerful ally and a valuable commodity. With your unique abilities you have the power to be an agent of change within this decaying metropolis. Use it wisely.

name: I Hope To See You Again
description:
Memories of a goodbye.

I hope to see you again is a short immersive videoclip made as a contribution for the Zium Gallery.

name: Cock Soccer
description: Multiplayer, arcade-style, 2.5D sports game with multiple customizable characters to choose from, chaotic gameplay that fuses soccer with some beat 'em up elements, and maps with traps that can change the course of the match in unexpected ways.

name: Bad Girl Confidential: The Pleasure Den
description: An explicit Click-Through Visual Novel about a good girl who wants to seduce a bad guy for a wild night in his Pleasure Den.

name: Resident Evil 4 HD Project
description: Resident Evil 4 HD Project is a mod for the Steam version of the survival horror video game Resident Evil 4. Created by a duo of modders, Albert Marin and Cris Morales, its purpose is to update the original remaster to the most thorough level possible and provide a "definitive graphical experience".

name: Celeste.smc
description: A Super Mario World rom hack created to reproduce Celeste's mechanics.

name: Technopoly: Industrial Empire
description:
Hi Boss! Are your ready to become the industrial are construction management tycoon?
Are you ready to become the ultimate business manager in one of the most exciting factory building management game? How about putting your construction management skills to use with this tap tap factory building manager? Spend your time looking after your very own industrial area and make money from the proceedings. In this building simulator, you must look after the industrial building establishments and be patient enough to make money and collect it on the correct time.

name: Bounce and Pop
description: Throw your slicer to the balloons. Satisfying experience when you clear the levels. Easy to learn but hard to expert.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: DR/DB DBmtrue/DBmu748 Pack
description: Built by the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these versatile doubledecker cars were used on regional passenger transport by Deutsche Reichsbahn and then by Deutsche Bahn. They feature custom bogeysounds, custom interior, and more!

name: Dead Station
description: Dead Station is an old school platforming experience set on the space station Soyuz-1 overrun by some hostile monsters. Your task is to arm yourself with melee weapons and firearms, find any answers on what the hell happened there and survive no matter what!

name: Les Mills Bodycombat VR
description: Les Mills Bodycombat brings exercise motivation to the metaverse with the launch of the Bodycombat VR app - fusing globally-renowned trainers with virtual reality (VR) for an out-of-this-world fitness gaming experience. Using an Oculus Quest VR headset, enter this immersive fitness game that brings you an extensive workout portfolio, top-quality coaching from Dan and Rachael, innovative mechanics, and different intensities for all levels of players.

name: The Zium Gallery
description:
Zequel to The Zium Garden.
The Zium Gallery is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

name: Essence of the Tjikko
description:
Explore a retro 3D fantasy world in this indie game, Essence Of The Tjikko.
Deep in a underground botanic lab, an hybrid plant child wakes up with no memory, only its plant instinct seeking for the sunlight.
Solve the puzzles and brave the traps in this adventure game inspired by the 2000's classics.
Will you get to the top and find the sunlight?

Available in 10 languages

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 8
description: Enjoy Another Sensational Vacation Running Pinecreek Hills National Park Spend a sensational Summer helping the Rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. Help people from the Community become Volunteer Rangers.

name: Basilisk
description: Basilisk is an unfinished RPG for the Super Nintendo, now mostly stable and playable through the very old SNESy+ Emulator. You play as a noble Knight from the old Kingdom, sent down to solve the famine.

name: SkyJumper
description: SkyJumper - Side Scroller with Runner elements. A game in which the player parries with a flying parachutist and dodges obstacles and sharp blades that fold on the move, which line up randomly and each time complicate the race.

name: Save the Body
description:
Save the Body is a First-person game about the Human Body.
The objective is to kill all germs in the body and unlock all infected cells and win the game

name: Rojo: A Spanish Horror Experience
description:
Explore the apartment of a nostalgic Francoist to find your friend in this short first person horror experience set in Spain.

The game takes place in an oppressive and unique atmosphere, full of references to the traditional Spanish culture. In this experience, the players must explore the creepy apartment to find clues and solve puzzles that help them find the protagonist's missing friend. With only a flashlight and their ingenuity, the players must enter the darkness and overcome their fears to reach the end.

name: Heart of a Warrior
description: Heart of a warrior is a RPG game in an open world where you play as Nahele, a young warrior of ancient bloodline on his journey to rescue his twin sister from the underworld, as he travel through portals to different realms of existence.

name: Squabble
description: A word game that pits you against your friends in a rapid-fire guessing match. Play against up to 99 other people and be the last standing.

name: Insipid
description: Insipid is a puzzle game for vigilance.

name: Line Strike
description: In Line Strike game, you get the role of the commander of a small army. All you need to do is select the type of troops and install it on the battlefield. The game does not require a quick reaction and microcontrol, only knowledge of the stats of your units and tactical ingenuity.

name: Darxanadon
description: Explore a massive interconnected labyrinth of grottos, castles, and groves in this 2D retro-inspired Action RPG.

name: 100 Days Without Delays
description: In this Match3 game you have to help Lee Milton manage her task to setup a successful new airport - in mere 100 days! Collect three colorful items in a row, upgrade the airport, even help police to solve the crime, and she will become the youngest airport manager in a company’s history!

name: With You
description: With You is a cooperative two-player puzzle-playground. It's a playful space that hopes to inspire couples to connect, communicate, and collaborate.

name: Magnus Imago
description: Magnus Imago is an atmospheric journey through a mysterious world of characters, traces and symbols. The task of the player is to solve the puzzles, using proper combinations of objects, finding them in the environment around him.

name: The House of Big people
description: Two Russian students Ivan and Alexander were expelled from the institute, but the knowledge remained with them. One day, while drinking beer, they come up with a brilliant idea - to create a superman who will not need food, and will work 24 hours a day.

name: Entropy
description: Fly between incomprehensible galaxies in this experimental micro game!

name: Rival Fury
description: A three-dimensional street brawler, expanding the way you fight. Featuring atmospheric side scrolling arenas with unique depth and camera style. An immersive and fast paced gang busting experience. Running at your opponents will help you own the streets and increase your martial arts ability.

name: Spooky Story
description: Spooky story - In this creepy platformer, you will get the role of a magic mushroom that went hunting for the treasures of elves. Carefully jump across the platforms to reach the goal

name: Next Door: An Eternal World
description: Tactical Isekai RPG by various races

name: Devil Spire
description: Devil Spire is a hardcore first-person pseudo-3D roguelite action RPG dungeon crawler stylized after retro PC games, developed by a guy and his bros while locked in quarantine. Inspired by classics like King's Field and Heretic.

name: Yeah Yeah Beebiss II
description: Yeah Yeah Beebiss II is the sequel to a game considered as lost media. As Kyonshi Hui and Jiangshi Bo, it is your quest to banish all evil in all 100 levels - 10 original stages, including the boss -- a mutated mass of pure evil. Yeah Yeah Beebiss II is a new retro homebrew game created as a love letter to the whole retro game scene!

name: TechnoMagic
description: Technomagic is a free browser MMO RPG game. The battle system is based on the rules of logic. Every fight victory depends not only on luck, armor or weapons, but also on the power of your thoughts.

name: Hundreds of Mysteries: Season1
description: Every case has a story behind it! You need to find and collect clues in the scene and reason at every level to find the truth. The clues can be associated or cross-layered.

name: Grid Slayer
description: A unique tactical grid based card game with roguelite elements. Use elemental wizardry to manipulate your environment and defeat overwhelming odds. Test your wits and resolve to rise above the chaos.

name: Roze Blud
description: Command your squad to seek and destroy in this fast-paced Tactical Arena Shooter. Defend the Homeland as Druidic Eco-Warriors (Roze Blud), or consolidate power as Corporate Mercenaries (NEED). Know your friends, find your enemies, fight until the last drop!

name: Oplitak
description: Oplitak is a game that combines various game mechanics such as 2D platforms and 2D shooters. The combination of cartoon-style graphics, dynamic gameplay and easter eggs make the game attractive to both young and old school gamers.

name: Afterinfection
description: afterinfection It is an island game, a small island and has recently been infected with a type of virus and only a handful of people are left on the island to survive, find food, water and build a camp. To survive from zombies? Mutant And other survivors created using UNREAL ENGINE4

name: The Hundred Year Kingdom
description: Create a world free of conflict in this innovative turn-based simulation. Work together with a mythical young goddess to develop a peaceful civilization over the course of a century.

name: Noisz Starlivht
description:
NOISZ STΔRLIVHT is a hybrid rhythm game / bullet hell shmup for Android and iOS. Become the new #1 hit idol group, battle interdimensional music monsters, rebel against your corporate overlords, wield a mighty soul-devouring experimental weapon, and be unstoppably, unapologetically gay in this standalone sequel to the 2018 rhythm bullet hell VN, NOISZ.

Build friendships with your team, explore the world of NOISZ, customize your outfits for fashion and fighting power, and experience an exciting new hybrid gameplay concept that's possible only on touchscreen.

name: Stardust Tycoon
description: Stardust Tycoon is a 2D exploration, trading, mining and fighting space game in an ever expanding procedurally generated universe. Get rich or die fast!

name: The Waylanders
description: The Waylanders is a party-based RPG inspired by beloved classics such as Dragon Age: Origins, Neverwinter Nights 2 or Baldur's Gate. Featuring innovative and tactical combat system, The Waylanders brings to life the legends of the Celtic cultures to life.

name: Wekele Wordle
description:
Worde, the addictive word-guessing game that challenges your vocabulary and deduction skills in just six attempts. Can you crack the code and find the hidden word?

Guess the daily word in 6 tries, practice with unlimited words or create your own Worde! Now with 5 levels: 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8 letter words!

name: Motu Patlu Super Duper Man
description: Motu Patlu Super Duper Man is an endless skating game where you can collect the coins and cross the hurdles. With a Motu Patlu characters skating on a busy road where you can find the path for survival to be very challenging and demanding a quick response. Here you have to escape him while running cars, trains, and different other hurdles. This skating game has a beautiful environment across the path and ultimate game play. You can also collect coins to unlock different Skate and other items of more importance in-game.

name: Lingword
description: Sin descripción

name: Professor Quackerton in: The Locked Birdhouse
description:
In this storybook game, Professor Quackerton and her friends have to band together in the wake of a loss. Experience this colorful world of queer animals with big personalities and a big problem.

When a dear friend passes, there is little to be done but to celebrate her life. Trouble is, everything seems to be going wrong. The twins are fighting, the cat is sleeping, and Max won't leave his post... What's a duck to do?

name: Play To Win
description: A romhack for SMW with 32 exits.

name: Iconoclasm
description: A simple short heretic map.

name: RESYNC
description: After crash-landing on a structure orbiting a distant star, work alongside your robotic allies to solve puzzles and uncover the true purpose of the mysterious outpost.

name: Cyber Theater
description: In this short point-and-click adventure, guide a digital friend as he tries to see the 7:00 showing of his favorite movie, Explosion City.

name: A Love Colored Blackbird
description: A short kinetic novel about a boy who can't stop dreaming and the blackbird that inhabits said dreams.

name: Fireworks
description:
Use the arrow keys to move left and right.

Tap Z or Space to flap.

Fly as long as you can.

name: Super Boss Collection
description: In this hack, you can fight against 77 bosses, including all the original SMW bosses, bosses ported from other games, and bosses created by other users!

name: DeFi Land
description: DeFi Land is the place to enjoy a farming, fishing, gardening and other relaxing activities. Users can build their villages, interact with other players and NPCs to craft the most precious items, compete for the leaderboards and revive the inner farmers in them.

name: My Girlfriend Loves a Mystery
description:
Your freshman year at university is not off to the best start—the dorms are full and now you're stuck in an apartment with an eccentric roommate who loves puzzles. Before you can even put down your bags, you're dragged off to a crime scene where you witness your roommate's incredible powers of deduction firsthand. It seems there is no time to catch your breath when your duo suddenly becomes a trio and then a quartet!

Your three teammates seem to be at odds with each other, and not just to get all the glory—but to win your affections as well! Can you crack the code to these cases... and their hearts?

name: OS:Memories
description: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiousity. Understand what happened to Andyby browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS:Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

name: The Legend of Zelda Redux
description:
Celebrating the 35th Anniversary since the release of the original Legend of Zelda on the Famicom Disk System on February 21st, 1986; and continuing over from the Zelda II Redux hack, The Legend of Zelda Redux (or Zelda 1 Redux) aims to tackle some of the odd designs and programming decisions from the original NES classic to revitalize and give new life to the beloved and cherished classic.

This hack tries to address a lot of points to make the game fit with the rest of the series (and Zelda 2 Redux) by doing some rebalancing and QoL changes, and also some visual flare into the game, without compromising the original game’s design. Be sure to check the full Changelog inside the ReadMe file for the full list of changes made to this hack, and also don’t forget to check the optional patches too!

name: Central Fugitive
description: A game about escaping constantly rotating mazes! An experiment in mastering coordination instead of controls! A story about a thief and a genie! Basically one of those astronaut tests where you get super disoriented! Almost definitely a bad idea!

name: Friday Night Funkin': V.S. Whitty - Definitive Edition
description: While strolling with your Girlfriend though an alleyway, you happen to notice an ominous glow coming from around the corner. Out steps Whitmore (Whitty), a hot-headed underground rock star who happens to have some beef with your Girlfriends parents. Think you've got what it takes to get him outta there?

name: Tusmo
description: Tusmo is a word-game like Wordle but using the french TV show Motus rules. You can play it with your friends or by yourself.

name: The Meteorite
description: Get a Multiplayer Action Shooter Game experience with your friends and family. Create your own Clans and fight for the best Clan. Create custom rooms as you want and enjoy with your friends. Earn In game Coins while playing The Meteorite and redeem them in the upcoming In Game Shop for new skins, weapons and new characters.

name: Fallen London: Mistress of the Skies
description: Mistress of the Skies is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones. Mistress of the Skies was originally published as an Exceptional Story.

name: Hive P v. S
description:
Hive P v. S is an arcade game where you fly around in a spaceship collecting stars. As you collect a star an entity from subspace appears and starts to chase the ship. As you keep on collecting stars, more entities appear and follows the first entity, creating a longer and longer tail that upon collision with the ship will destroy it.

Goal of the game is to avoid the tail for as long as possible while collecting stars. Scattered around the universe, you'll find power-ups that can be used to your advantage. Some can destroy the entities chasing the ship, doing so creates more stars and gives bonus points.

name: Math it Right 3D Adventure
description: Play some great and exciting math challenges with Math it Right 3D Adventure, the math game for your kids aged 6 to 9. Join Pilipili the dragon on his quest to master the foundation of arithmetic and times tables, defeat the mischievous Thanatos and save your friends from Dragon City.

name: Ducky
description: Help save Ducky's siblings in this fun, adventure platformer. Jump your way through levels full of traps, enemies, and goodies. Flick switches, collect the keys, open the doors and let those siblings out!

name: Chromarena
description: Chromarena is a 2D top-down twin-stick arena shooter. Combine offense and defense to tear through hordes of color-coded enemies to unlock new guns and set high scores. Form short and medium-term plans, dodge attacks with fully responsive controls, and get into a flow state.

name: Pachillinko
description: Pachillinko is a mix of japanese Pachinko and western Plinko style game, set in neon synthwave design with some retro feeling of 80s. Relaxing mouse-only clicking gameplay allows you to sit back and just chill...

name: Life is Paine
description: Life is Paine is a humorous Point and Click Adventure where you play a bard which has lost his voice due to an unfortunate accident and tries to regain it.

name: Cats and Jigsaws
description: This is a cats-themed 2D jigsaw puzzle that includes a level challenge mode and a daily challenge mode. All you have to do is assembling the cats in different squares into a whole according to the needs. In addition, a diary feature has been added. Enjoy the healing effect brought by the cute cats!

name: Deep Fishing
description: Deep Fishing is a free casual shooting game, catch fish and sea monsters and hunt treasures in the deep sea to build your empire on the sea.

name: Hyper Road Carnage
description: Fast paced action racing game with arcade style endless gameplay.

name: Lord Temin's Fortress
description: Lord Temin's Fortress by Neil Carpenter is a new first person puzzle/adventure game from Gnarlewood. Experience grand scale architecture, epic music and a deeply immersive atmosphere with contantly new and compelling gameplay.

name: Vampire Survivors
description: Mow thousands of night creatures and survive until dawn! Vampire Survivors is a gothic horror casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly snowball against the hundreds of monsters that get thrown at you.

name: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles
description: Meet Lumote, the squishiest bioluminescent creature, in this beautiful 3D puzzle platformer. Take control of the world’s inhabitants on a quest into the Great Depths to seize control from the Mastermote.

name: Paco
description: A sci-fi 2D puzzle platformer utilizing an unusual gun, that allows you to navigate a robot incineration facility.

name: Exoblast
description: Exoblast is a shoot'em up arcade game, pimped with synthwave music and pixel art. Choose your pilot, your ship and join the arena to confront other players in nervous and punitive matches. Impose your gameplay and reach the top of the tower!

name: ACA Neo Geo: Big Tournament Golf
description: "NEO TURF MASTERS" is a golf game released by SNK in 1996. Players can choose from a total of six golfers with different abilities and play on courses located around the world such as Australia or Germany. Players can test out their golf game skills against friends with game modes such as "STROKE PLAY" and "MATCH PLAY (2P battle only)". The "ACA NEOGEO" series has faithfully reproduced many classic NEOGEO masterpieces. Players can change various game settings such as game difficulty, and also reproduce the atmosphere of arcade display settings at that time. Players can also compete against each other from all over the world with their high scores. Please enjoy the masterpiece that built a generation for video games.

name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm Remastered
description: Life is Strange: Before the Storm returns with remastered visuals across characters & environments.

name: Life is Strange Remastered
description: Experience the BAFTA award-winning story of Life is Strange now beautifully remastered with enhanced visuals and vastly improved animation using mocap technology.

name: Life is Strange Remastered Collection
description: Return to Arcadia Bay and experience two award-winning Life is Strange games like never before! Remastered visuals and animation breathe new life into the great cast of characters and gripping stories.

name: Duck Run
description:
Duck Run is a platformer game about a race between two ducks in search of the last chips on the market.
Be a duck and race against Otap to get what you want most.

name: Kharon's Crypt: Even Death May Die
description:
Kharon's Crypt is an eerie non-linear dungeon crawler game full of puzzles, riddles and deadly challenges, and graphics designed to follow the aesthetics of the beloved Game Boy Color. In Kharon's Crypt, you'll be playing as Kharon (a being thought to be death itself) in his mission to escape from the crypt where he had been sealed by a deranged king that wanted to elude death.

As Kharon, your abilities are flying, going through physical objects, and stun your enemies. To defeat your opponents and escape from the crypt, you'll need to steal the bodies of your enemies by possessing them. You'll be able to fly in a bat's body, fight from inside a skeleton, or even use a mimic's abilities to help yourself hide.

Do you have what it takes to escape from the crypt and compel the Deranged King to meet his fate?

name: Apes vs. Zombies
description:
Everything was so idyllic, but one day a horde of zombies appeared and stole your beloved Jane.

In Apes vs. Zombies, you will help our chief ape “Kong” defend his kingdom against the imminent zombie invasion and rescue your girlfriend Jane. What are you waiting for? Grab your bazooka and gather your monkey friends to give the zombies a good bang for their buck and free your Jane.

name: Memory Novel: The Sex Sauna
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing a small sex story in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match,

name: This Game is For You 2022
description: Hi there, welcome! This is a horror game I've made just for you.

name: The Bikini Bottom Massacre
description: When Squidward is let go of his job at the Krusty Krab, his dissatisfaction with life is at its zenith. After years of torment from his buffoon neighbours, Spongebob and Patrick, Squidward decides to take his life into his own hands. A Spongebob-themed Doom II total conversion parody mod for use with GzDoom.

name: Binary Non-Binary
description: Top down puzzle where you control both characters with the same input.

name: Friday Night Funkin': The Trollge Files
description: The Trollge Files is a horror mod for Friday Night Funkin' directed by Malicious Bunny about Agent Blueballs, an agent for the Trollge Containment Facility who trap and contain corrupted trolls. When Agent Blueballs is tasked to take down a particularly dangerous troll, he gets trapped inside his own subconscious and has to face his inner demons one by one to escape, and save his world.

name: Urban Exploration Bundle
description:
Cotton Game's puzzle adventures in one pack!

Rain City: a city where rain always pours. This puzzle game features warm, picture book-like graphics and a story with lifelike animals.

Mr. Pumpkin's Adventure is a point-and-click puzzle game. The main character of this game is Mr. Pumpkin who lost his memories. During the adventure, you will help him solve all the puzzles, which will eventually unveil an evil plot.

name: Falling Into You
description: You've seemed to have had a lot of bad luck. Like really bad luck. But lucky for you (for once), the perfect person appears right in front of you at the perfect time. But is any of it really that perfect?

name: Dungeon Dwarves
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Behold the ultimate idle dungeon crawler! Explore dungeons, vanquish monsters, and collect goodies to upgrade your warrior's abilities and weapons.

Tap your way through deep dungeons, fight as a team and show your enemies what Dwarves are really made of!

name: Dedalium
description:
Dedalium is an innovative RPG game which can be played on any website installing the browser extension, but there is a lot to do on the app as well!

The first steps of the game consists on selecting your initial gear, this gear will get experience when you fight and complete missions and will become more powerful. You will be able to find new gear on mystery boxes.

name: Mouse Maze
description: Navigate mazes with your mouse! Be fast enough to finish the level on time, but be careful not to crash! This game is able to be controlled entirely by mouse alone, no keyboard required! Plenty of settings to customize your experience (adjust difficulty up or down).

name: Turning Red Dancing Tiles Hop
description: Welcome to turning red with these new tiles revealed for tiles hop. If you love jumping ball games and,dancing with Mei Lee and her mother's obedient daughter and the chaos of her game, then you will love this game. It's very fun and time-killing, river dance, jump-ball with turning red and Mei Lee dance hop Tiles is one among the foremost widespread games.

name: Dangerous Roads Ahead
description: In the year 199X, A team of game developers discovered a lost Commodore 64 game, and decided to remake it for the Playstation 1. Unbeknownst to them, they awoken great evils laying dormant in that Cassette Tape.

name: Naàra: Contos de Resistencia
description: NaÀra tells the history of a Brazilian indigenous of the Tupinambá tribe, who, in the year 1500, discovers her mystical ancestry, and, using time-space and 7 magical arrows as her allies, will have to sneak through the shadows to fight oppression in its many forms and faces.

name: Basault VR
description: Basault VR is a virtual reality movement shooter. Run, jump, swing around on your grappling hook and shoot with a variety of complex yet familiar firearms. Use those tools to survive and reach the end of this roguelite!

name: Deadly Racing Duel
description: Deadly Racing Duel - in the role of a racer who conquers circuit auto racing, you accept challenge after challenge in order to prove how good a racer you are.

name: OverWall
description: You and your friends play as four brave engineer pandas in their new improvised role : defender of the Great Wall of China. A game in local coop, can be played by four person. Follow the plans and organise to make your ammunition to repel your countless enemies !

name: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss
description: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss is a mature, four-part, gritty interactive drama series, shrouded in crime, secrets and the supernatural. A proper adaptation to werewolf fiction, with deep character development.

name: Marimo vs. I.A.S
description: A 2.5D shooter with old-fashioned side-scrolling and a way to attack enemies in the background. Fight with lock-on shots that can track up to 6 enemies appearing from the back of the screen at the same time, and forward charge shots that can penetrate enemies and enemy bullets.

name: Kilroy Was Here
description: You are stuck in an unknown place, completely alone for eternity. Every decision you’ve made, will make, and could have made somehow rattling around your head. The only thing you can understand is a rock, with a gratified picture and some text that reads ‘Kilroy Was Here’!

name: Ytbb
description: Sin descripción

name: I Don't Think I've Walked This Stretch of Road Before
description: Walk the length of your memories on a lonely country highway. Follow the signal. Return to the place you left behind. Piece together a truth you can live with. A short, ambiguous narrative adventure game.

name: Ghost
description: Ghost is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and scares you in every way. The main goal is to survive and be saved.

name: Boom Wars
description: Boom Wars is an Action Multiplayer Game , Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win .

name: Leningrad
description: Cataclysm destroyed the sky and the earth, but it didn't destroy "Leningrad" - an autonomous underwater city-fortress. It is up to you to take on the role of the Captain of the "Leningrad". The future of the ship and its citizens depends on your actions.

name: Planetkillerz: Death of a world in five acts.
description: The world is ending. It's up to a small group of misfits to figure out what that actually is going to look like, and what the post-apocalypse will actually bring forth.

name: Winter With You
description: Naoki was really excited about spending Christmas with his beloved. But those plans weren't meant to be - Naoki saw her hugging another guy. Christmas seems ruined but just one random encounter can change everything. This is a Japanese-style kinetic visual novel about the Christmas.

name: Surreal Nightmare
description: "Surreal Nightmare" is a 3D horror game with first-person gameplay. Upon finding a doll in the trash and taking it to her house, the doll is possessed by an evil entity.

name: Sharon and the Last Garden
description: Cleanse the world with the power of bacteria.

name: Jump Lanes
description: Jump Lanes is a science fiction turn based game about shipping lanes in space. Make wild profits by getting to the best opportunities first. The primary inspiration is train-based board games. If you enjoy those then this game was made for you.

name: Mysteries of Darkness
description:
A roguelike single-player card game where you battle fierce creatures in turn-based combat.
Win battles to improve your cards, and build a powerful deck capable of defeating the demon that opened the portal to hell.

name: Spaceship Hunters
description: Spaceship Hunters is a chaotic couch co-op shoot-em-up for 4 players. Working as a crew, fight your way through the worst criminals the universe has to offer.

name: Bloodborne PSX
description: A fan demake (PS1 era) of From Software's PS4 exclusive: Bloodborne.

name: Zeitgeist
description: Equipped with your pot plant companion, travel through the roots of time delving into the past and present depths of an ancient submerged city. Exploring grand halls, navigating between walls, and taking advantage of ancient mechanisms on your mission to steal the heart of the city.

name: Anime Collector: Evo
description: Anime Collector: EVO is an adult open-world MMORPG. Earn your status, worth and reputation by finding rare art, items and resources. Do this by completing quests, defeating monsters, finding hidden secrets and playing various mini-games.

name: Silo27: Crashlanded
description: An interstellar cargo ship crashlands on a planet that should not have been there.Explore, solve puzzles and fight your way through ancient ruins to find the portal that will bring you back on Earth.

name: Riding Seas
description: Climb aboard varied, colorful and fun boats to prove your piloting skills in frenzied races with current cartoon graphics! Attention in Riding Seas there is no place for chance!

name: Solargene
description: Build and manage colonies on the surfaces of planets and satellites, as well as space stations. With realistic physics of orbital flights.

name: Personal Rocket
description: A point-and-click adventure about paranoia and loneliness, the evils of capitalism and too much web surfing, the material world and the occult universe. Your typical postmodern blues.

name: Menos: Psi-Shatter
description: A High-impact Action Shooter with a Telekinetic protagonist. Throw enemies and pick up weapons with your mind while battling through the depths of Site Echo, a research facility losing control of a world consuming force.

name: Capybara Quest
description:
The human roads and messy lawns are at a strange duality with the rural wetlands the capybara belongs to.

As more and more houses are constructed on wetlands in Argentina, capybaras are being driven from their homes and have found themselves living in peoples lawns. Trawl though the streets to find the woods, and follow the trail downstream towards the wetlands that are safe and full of friends.

name: Shimokita Rose & Tears
description: The protagonist is struggling with their gender. And realizing that they're in love with their best friend Haruto, the protagonist decides to work at Rose & Tears to be honest themselves about who they are, finding a family there who help them discover their identity.

name: Five Nights at Billy's
description: Billy and Van have had a glitch in their programing. It's up to you to make it through five nights and not let them get you.

name: Memory Novel: Lesbian Romance
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing a small lesbian romance sex story in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Inscryption Pico-8
description: A demake of Inscryption for PICO-8. Your goal is to defeat Leshy.

name: Speedmap Snack Pack 2: Cosmic Hunger
description: Speedmap jam pack of 19 levels from 21 authors organized into 3 episodes, all made within 48 hours. Mappers could choose from 4 themes (Cr8 base, Egypt, Firetop Mountain, or Knave) with specific weapon progressions. Most maps range from small to medium sized, and can be played from shotgun start if desired.

name: Trolley Folly
description: The classic trolley problem. What will you choose?

name: Planetwo
description: Spin around the space and try to collect all of the cosmic flowers!

name: Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 5C, Level 6C, and Level 7C
description: Sin descripción

name: Racing: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - 2 Player Cooperation Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sushi vs. Remilia Scarlet
description: A doujin game by Kyuushoku Touban based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Quordle
description: Put your skills to the test and solve four Wordles at once! You have 9 guesses to solve all four words. A new Quordle available each day to solve.

name: Pokémon Unite: Season 3
description: Ranked Season 3 is here and you've got plenty of time to rank up before it ends on April 27, 2022. Make sure to at least reach Expert Class to get the free Trainer Outfit for this Season 3 Ranked!

name: Overlapped
description: A first person puzzle game where you mix overlapping realities.

name: Semantle
description: A daily word-guessing game where each guess must be a word (of any length) or short phrase. The game will tell you how semantically similar it thinks your word is to the secret word. Unlike that other word game, it's not about the spelling; it's about the meaning.

name: Fusem
description:
The original 'Fusem' number stacking and jamming puzzle.

Start your game with a 6x6 grid of 2s, 4s, and 8s, and swap tiles to match your numbers.

Watch in excitement as your tile values compound in an exhilarating chain reaction which stacks your possible matches with every turn.

Delightfully simple to get started with, and fiendishly challenging as your numbers grow, this math merging, number fusing, score stacking and tile jamming puzzle game will have you strategizing several moves ahead as you plan not to corner your most valuable tiles or sabotage your next high score attempt.

Get involved in one of the most exciting number matching puzzles available and show off your high scores.

name: Bangman
description: Bangman is a top-down action roguelike in which you have to defeat hordes of bloodthirsty and cute monsters as you travel from world to world.

name: Skelton Zone Traveler Emergence
description: Help the travelers escape the horrors of the Skelton Zone.

name: Arsenal
description:
Arsenal is a 3D First Person Shooter multiplayer game for the Fabwelt Gaming Ecosystem and Metaverse. It utilizes in-game NFTs as assets, collectibles, and utilities. In-game assets are all blockchain collectibles that users utilize in playing the game. As blockchain-based items, in-game assets can be freely withdrawn from the game for other uses such as collateral on decentralized lending protocol, staking, gifting, or passing it down as an inheritance. In-game assets can be seen as a commodity.

It’s fully playable as a WebGL game on your browser. It has a “battleground” look and feels and it’s fully integrated with blockchain technology. Pay to Play and Play to Earn is integrated in such a way, it attracts everyday players as well as professional players around the world, to get incentives and fun. Many different types of maps are included like big maps for sniping, and small maps for fast close combat.

name: Gem Raider 2
description: Gem Raider 2 is an old-school move-and-shoot game. Your objective in each room is to destroy all of the Power Gems and return to the teleport pad to exit. Other Gems can also be destroyed to increase your score. There are 20 rooms and each of the 9 types of enemy Gems has unique weapons or skills.

name: The Ketchup Story
description: Become one of the biggest ketchup kings in the world with this breathtaking story of young entrepreneur with small dream which comes through.

name: Dodge Dots
description: Very simple reaction game. Move your white dot to collect blue things while dodging black dots. Offers Steam achievements and a leaderboard.

name: Shooter's Island
description: Shooter’s Island is an aim trainer with VR support, built for FPS pros and beginners alike. On an expansive, remote island, several trials await you that train your reflexes and precision. Analyze your shooting skills on your personal low-poly testing island!

name: Slide!
description: Slide! is a puzzle game where you control a happy boy and have to defeat your arch-enemy Angry Man. It features 13 levels, each harder than the last, and was made for the Game Jaaj 7 game jam.

name: Sex Adventures: The Job Interview
description: A visual novel about a young woman named Jessica, who is willing to do almost anything to succeed at her job interview.

name: UnDune II: The Demaking of a Dynasty
description:
A strategy-based resource management simulation, where three houses fight for control of the planet Dune - the land of sand and home of the spice.

It is a demake of the classic (and original) RTS game Dune II, re-created from scratch in PICO-8.

name: Wroth
description: A short / medium sized base-themed map with modified grunts and enforcer monsters. Based on progs_dump 2.0 devkit (already included), and inspired by Mountains of Insanity.

name: Quad Run
description: An assorted pack of 15 levels made in 48 hours for a community speedmapping jam, all centered around the Quad Damage powerup.

name: Moonlit District
description: Moonlit District is a Vanilla-Compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring textures from Perdition's gate. The WAD was a speed-map project made over the course of 4 days. It was tested in Chocolate Doom, Crispy Doom, and DSDA-Doom (complevel 2). Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.

name: Old-Fashioned Way to Die
description: Sin descripción

name: Flood Escape 64
description: A Super Mario 64 rom hack based on the Roblox game Flood Escape.

name: Jujutsutchi
description: The Jujutsutchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the anime and manga franchise Jujutsu Kaisen.

name: ColourS
description:
ColourS is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The primary goal of the game is to explore Midoritsuki's dream world and collect effects.

One interesting element of this game is that the majority of the dream world is initially in grayscale. There are several colored orbs hidden in the dream world for the player to find that will change the appearance of certain areas once obtained, also granting the player access to new areas/effects.

name: Long and Steady Departure
description: Long and Steady Departure is a platformer game about a mysterious girl named Aya who must traverse her own mysterious world by flipping the gravity.

name: Ayleouna
description: Take Ayleouna on an asteroid hopping adventure in this action platformer with gravity bending elements.

name: Here Comes the Wiji Waji
description: Here Comes The Wiji Waji is a multiplayer survival game, where several creatures went to a Playground, and one of them is the Wiji Waji, who is blood thirsty.

name: Golden Age
description: Guard the holy city, and at the right time, go deep into the hinterland of the dark legion, and retrieve the holy objects lost in the last temple catastrophe, the book of contract, the holy grail, the holy sword, the holy stone, the magic bottle, the Thor's hammer, etc.

name: Hunt-or-Haunt
description: Hunt-or-Haunt is a 6 to 12 player online game where two teams, Hunters and Haunts, face-off in pandemonius battles of elimination! As Hunters combine forces to uncover and dispatch their ghostly foes, Haunts use their stealth and trickery to divide and conquer. Eliminate your opponents to win!

name: Project Kunai
description: Project Kunai is a super fast FPS/Platformer game which you can use special abilitys and Kunai. Reach highest speed and complate levels fastest yo can. Learn the truth about Project Kunai and your past.

name: So Long as There is Mercy
description: Lead Spe, the game‘s protagonist, through an eerie dollhouse in an effort to find her little brother. On her way, Spe will encounter the ghost-children, who are also trapped, and can use their different abilities to solve the environmental puzzles in order to escape the house.

name: Pirates of the Maverta
description: Maverta Island - minimalist, relaxing, motion logic, mind game. The player's goal is to survive the labyrinth and find treasure.

name: Running Boy
description: Running Boy is a NSFW 2D board parkour game. The main way to play is to collect white balls to unlock the movie.

name: Beat the Little Zombie
description: Beat the Little Zombie is a first person NSFW zombie game.

name: Nice Girl Like Me
description: Nice Girl Like Me is a 2D leisure game.

name: Magic Pen Color Book
description: This coloring book game will let your kid(s) draw by finger touch anything from their imagination or color, decorate the ready to use templates included, in order to create their own unique paintings. Many painting tools are available to help them, including pencils, markers, color bucket, stickers, magic pen, color spray, patterns, with undo/redo capabilities. Once kids are done with their creations, those are automatically saved into device memory with the possibility to be later erased to start over and over...

name: Furries & Scalies & Scarecrows Oh My!
description: The island of Roanoake is a small, quaint farming community that has recently been swept up in the king's war effort. Crops and weaponry are needed to provide the troops with food and a way to fight the enemy. Many on the island feel that this is an impairment on their way of life, and many feel that it is not. Can you navigate this sea of discomfort in order to make the island of Roanoake prosperous once more?

name: Ms. Match
description: Ms. Match is the first and only book of the Ms. Match series.

name: Immortal Snake Nest
description: A visit to the hospital goes awry.

name: Rest
description: A short game about death.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+: Mehagashi-hen
description: An extra arc bundled in Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Lap of the Kami
description: The additional battle stage "Lap of the Kami" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Chickie Catchers
description: Help Mocha and Butternut Squash catch the birdies from the treetops in this cute co-op physics game!

name: Crazy Super Bunnies
description: Control your bunnies to get past pits, spikes, and other traps, or various obstacles, doing your best to reach the end of the courses, and maybe grab carrot bonuses or other kinds of bonuses even more times. You're being timed in each level, so try being as fast as possible.

name: Terraria: The Stars Above
description: The Stars Above is a Terraria expansion mod that adds a new important game mechanic: the Starfarer system. ​

name: Gayandere
description: You go to a mountain chalet after a recent breakup. There, strange things are going to happen...

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 4: Baiken
description: This allows the character "Baiken" to be used in-game.

name: FeedVid Live
description: FeedVid Live is a short puzzle game taking place in an unusual livestreaming app. It's a standalone sequel to FeedVid - the games can be played in any order as the stories are not directly related.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC1 Pack: Forest of Magic & Youkai Mountain
description: This DLC is Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya’s expansion DLC.

name: Otakle
description: A game inspired the popular web-based game Wordle where you need to guess the name of an anime or gaming character within 6 tries. Every try gives you new hints on who the mystery character is. A new puzzle is available every day at midnight. After you're done with the daily puzzle, you can share your score with friends and see who does better.

name: The Smiling Man
description: A game where a completely mad man, who watches you and stalks you during a temporarily peaceful night, is ready to flee this terrifying danger?

name: R-Type Final 2: DLC Set 5
description: Includes 2 new stages.

name: Thea Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: I've Seen Everything: Dogs
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Dogs" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Cats
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Cats" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: Cold Steel
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Cold Steel" category.

name: HenPri: Hentai Prison
description: Minato Shuuichirou, known as the infamous "Flasher", is considered "beyond rehabilitation" and banished to the notorious Tulip Prison for a 10-year sentence filled with back-breaking labor. Can this daring exhibitionist make it in a prison packed with shady characters?

name: Pixel Jumper
description: Help Idaho Joe explore the caves of Idaho seeking loads of treasures. Watch out for rock monsters. Idaho Joe only has two survival skill. Collect all the coins and become a billionaire explorer!

name: Cue Sports
description: Cue sports is a small collection of different billard and snooker game modes. You can play standard eight ball billard or with the nine ball rule set. In addition you can play snooker with six balls, 10 balls or 15 balls ruleset. Play against the computer controller oppponent or your friends in some relaxing or exciting matches.

name: So Far, So High
description: The main task of the game is to get out of a deep hole by jumping on platforms and being careful of various enemies. On each floor there is a different number of chests, when opening which we can drop power ups and weapons. With each floor, the pit becomes deeper, and the enemies become more resistant. Good luck, you'll need it.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+ is a remaster of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou, which contains all of the previous chapters from the series with additional songs, upscaled sprites, and a new scenario based on a mini-light novel chapter named Mehagashi-hen.

name: Chaos Chain
description: Chaos Chain is a dark cyberpunk roleplaying game set in a bleak dystopian future. Assume the role of a desperate dweller of Slade City, a sprawling urban nightmare of grimy asphalt and broken dreams where crime and disorder run rampant. - Stay Alert. Stay Armed. Stay Alive. Don't lose your humanity.
